dct_title_s: TABULA GENERALIS TOTIUS BELGII qua PROVINCIAE XVII. INFER. GERMANIAE olim sub S.R.I. CIRCULO BURGUNDIAE comprehensae nunc in Varias Potentias tum liberas utpote PROV. VII. FOEDERATAS, tum reliquas HISPANIAE et GALLIAE Coronis subjectas, separata ostenduntur
dct_description_sm: Large scale map of the Netherlands with a small globe beneath the title cartouche showing California as an island. The globe centers on the Pacific with the island partially obscured by Mercury’s outstretched arm. Published in a collection of maps without a title page by Johann Baptist Homann and Heirs, with various maps dated from 1720-1771.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
